data.name: Joel Diaz Arévalo
data.Profile: Ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway hack, for floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes climb leg roll over and sun my belly,

certificate.description: Hack up furballs try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall.
certificate.name: FrontEnd Developer

certificate.description: Scratch at the door then walk away wack the mini furry mouse
certificate.name: Backend Developer

Academic.description: I’m so hungry i’m so hungry but ew not for that pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms
Meow in empty rooms. Find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in for hack.

experience.jobDescription: Led the product development and support team of the company.

I had the opportunity to participate as an educator in the area of ​​physics in the Sotavento popular education group, giving and supporting classes for young people and adults who aspired to access higher education.
I worked on the design and development of cross-platform Chatbots with Dialogflow from Google Cloud.
